tool_description: Creates research tasks and assignments based on provenance gaps and validation issues to guide further investigation.

item_id.description: Unique identifier for the collection item

task_priority.description: Priority level for generated tasks (high, medium, low)

research_types.description: Types of research to include (archival, database, expert_consultation, auction_records)

assigned_researcher.description: Name of researcher to assign tasks to

due_date.description: Due date for research tasks in ISO 8601 format

include_gaps_only.description: Whether to create tasks only for identified gaps

error_messages: Item not found: The specified item_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid task_priority: Must be one of [high, medium, low].
Invalid research_types: Must include only [archival, database, expert_consultation, auction_records].
Invalid due_date: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time format and in the future.
No gaps or issues found: No research tasks needed for this item based on current analysis.
usage: Provide item_id to generate research tasks. Configure priority, research types, assignment, and due date as needed.

task_summaries.description: Array of task descriptions and objectives
